actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

official_title: Honoring the 50th anniversary of the Joint Center for Political and Economic Studies.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
Emergency medical services and trauma care
Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: This resolution honors the Joint Center for Political and Economic Studies and reaffirms the commitment of the House of Representatives to working alongside the center and others to advance ideas and policies that promote, uplift, and enrich the Black community and all of America.

titles.title: Honoring the 50th anniversary of the Joint Center for Political and Economic Studies.
